full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Product Sub-Category 1 - Rotary Chairs
#### Solicitation Number: 5Z011-24-0199

This Request for Proposal (RFP) invites qualified tenders to submit bids for the purchase and delivery of rotary chairs for theLibrary and Archives Canada (LAC). The requirement is part of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is subject to the General Stream of the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H.

#### Procurement Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** January 15th, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 10th, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** February 29th, 2024

#### Product Description
The requirement includes the purchase and delivery of rotary chairs to LAC's location at 45 Sacre-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 1C6.

#### Inquiries
Inquiries regarding this requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority, Isabelle Legault, via email at [receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca](mailto:receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca) or by phone at (613) 410-4428.

#### Pre-Qualified SA Holders
To find out how to become a pre-qualified SA holder, please contact the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at [TPSGC.PARCNAmeublement-APNCRFurniture.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:TPSGC.PARCNAmeublement-APNCRFurniture.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Tenders and Attachments
Tenders must be submitted by January 15th, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST. The tender notice and attachments are available on the Government of Canada's Bidorsch database at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

#### Important Details
This procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is subject to the General Stream of the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H.

Please note: 
* The procurement will be conducted in accordance with the Government of Canada's regulations and guidelines.
